contents.name: Act 4
headers: In the Name of the Law

entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
The 13th entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars 2 End of Dragons.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

entries.name: In the Name of the Law
entries: In the Name of the Law

hp.special: 6 plus six times your Engineer level (the mech has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your Engineer level)

trait.name: Mechanical Bond
entries: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the mech makes.

action.name: Hard Strike
entries: {@atk m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus}, reach 5 ft. {@h} {@damage 1d6 + 3} plus your Intelligence modifier bludgeoning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Bolt
entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Fire a projectile that hinders foes and helps allies.

optionalfeature.name: Double Bolt

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Scepter. Must follow Shadow Bolt.

entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Fire two projectiles that hinder foes and help allies.

optionalfeature.name: Triple Bolt

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Scepter. Must follow Double Bolt.

entries: {@b Description:} Fire three missiles that hinder foes and help allies.

optionalfeature.name: Shadowsquall
entries: {@b Description:} Stealth Attack. Unleash a barrage from the shadows towards your target.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Sap
entries: {@b Description:} Hurl a bolt of unfurling shadows to bolster allies.

optionalfeature.name: Triple Threat
entries: {@b Description:} Fire three missiles that hinder foes and help allies.

optionalfeature.name: Twilight Combo

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Scepter (with offhand Dagger)

entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Dual Wield. Fire a slow-moving projectile, then fire a quick shot that accelerates the first.

optionalfeature.name: Measured Shot

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Scepter (with offhand Pistol)

entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Dual Wield. Shadowstep and fire a shot that hinders foes and helps allies.

optionalfeature.name: Endless Night

prerequisite.other: Thief wielding a Scepter (with offhand Pistol). Must follow Measured Shot.

entries: {@b Description:} Dual Wield. Fire a beam that hinders foes and helps allies.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Gloom
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to your target location and drop a well that cripples foes and heals allies.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Bounty
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to a targeted point and create a well that grants boons to allies.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Silence
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to the target area and lay down a well that removes conditions from allies.
{@b Effect:} Gain shadow force for each condition removed. The first strike of the well dazes foes.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Sorrow
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to your target location and create a well that inflicts foes with conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Well of Tears
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to the target location and drop a well that repeatedly strikes foes.

optionalfeature.name: Shadowfall
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to the target location and drop a well that continuously pulls foes to its center, increasing intensity with each hit.

optionalfeature.name: Specter
entries: Unlock scepter. Steal becomes Siphon. Gain access to shadow force through spending initiative, and gain access to Shadow Shroud ability.

optionalfeature.name: Second Opinion
entries: A portion of condition damage is converted to healing power. Gain condition damage, which is increased while wielding a scepter.

optionalfeature.name: Shallow Grave
entries: Transfer conditions to an enemy when targeting them with Siphon. Remove conditions from nearby allies and your targeted ally when targeting them with Siphon.

optionalfeature.name: Consume Shadows
entries: Gain stacks of Consume Shadows at regular intervals while in Shadow Shroud. Exiting Shadow Shroud consumes your remaining shadow force and heals allies based on the number of stacks you have gained. Allies that are fully healed receive the rest of the value in barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Dark Sentry
entries: Apply Rot Wallow Venom to allies you grant barrier to. Outgoing healing to allies is increased. Rot Wallow Venom effect cannot apply to yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Larcenous Torment
entries: Steal health and gain shadow force when you torment a foe. Does not grant shadow force while in shroud.

optionalfeature.name: Amplified Siphoning
entries: Gain increased shadow force when hitting a foe with Siphon. Grant increased barrier when targeting an ally.

optionalfeature.name: Traversing Dusk
entries: Heal allies in the area around you when you shadowstep. Gain shadow force for each ally in the radius. Wells grant resistance on their initial impact.

optionalfeature.name: Panaku's Ambition
entries: Gain barrier when you strike foes with a stealth attack. When you apply stealth to allies you also grant them barrier. This effect can only be received once and will reset when stealth is removed.

optionalfeature.name: Strength of Shadows
entries: Gain expertise based on a percentage of your vitality. Torment you inflict deals increased damage.

optionalfeature.name: Hungering Darkness
entries: While in shroud, transfer conditions from your tethered ally and cleanse conditions from yourself. Each condition removed in this fashion heals a percentage of your base health and grants your tethered ally barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Shadestep
entries: Shadow Shroud skills provide additional supportive effects to nearby allies and your tethered ally.

optionalfeature.name: Enter Shadow Shroud
entries: {@b Description:} Enter shadow shroud and tether a targeted or previously siphoned ally, granting them barrier.
{@b Effect:} If no target is selected, one will be chosen randomly in the indicated radius.

optionalfeature.name: Exit Shadow Shroud
entries: {@b Description:} Exit your shadow shroud, breaking the tether between you and your ally.

optionalfeature.name: Haunt Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash darkness in a targeted area, inflicting conditions on foes while healing and granting might to nearby allies and your tethered ally for each target struck.

optionalfeature.name: Grasping Shadows
entries: {@b Description:} Unleash darkness in a targeted area, inflicting conditions on foes.
{@b Effect:} Cleanse conditions from yourself while healing and cleansing your tethered ally, based on targets struck.

optionalfeature.name: Dawn's Repose
entries: {@b Description:} Leap to the targeted area, inflicting fear on foes at your ending point.
{@b Effect:} Grant barrier to your tethered ally and nearby allies based on targets struck. Heal your tethered ally based on targets struck.

optionalfeature.name: Eternal Night
entries: {@b Description:} Strike at foes in front of you with your shadow magic, inflicting conditions.
{@b Effect:} Nearby allies and your tethered ally gain health for each enemy struck.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Shock
entries: {@b Description:} After a short channel, unleash a blast of compressed magic that stuns enemies.
{@b Effect:} Nearby allies and your tethered ally gain stability. Heal your tethered ally based on each enemy you hit.

optionalfeature.name: Singeing Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Singe your foes by unleashing a burst of flame from your hammer.

optionalfeature.name: Surging Flames
entries: {@b Description:} Sweep your hammer forward to send flames rushing at your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Wheel
entries: {@b Description:} Summon a projectile of fire that circles around you, damaging foes. While this projectile is active, it grants you increased outgoing damage. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Grand Finale
entries: {@b Description:} Redirect any active circular projectiles towards your target.

optionalfeature.name: Triple Sear
entries: {@b Description:} Sear a path to burn your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Molten End
entries: {@b Properties:} Fire, Explosive, Inflicts Burn, Grants Boons
{@b Description:} Slam your hammer into the ground, damaging nearby enemies. If this strikes a burning enemy, gain offensive boons.

optionalfeature.name: Stream Strike

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Hammer

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Stream Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Water Rush|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Chilling Crack|GW2EoD}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Strike your foe with a watery blow.
{@b Effect:} Choose up to 5 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d6} cold damage.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d6}), and 17 ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Water Rush

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Hammer

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Stream Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Water Rush|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Chilling Crack|GW2EoD}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Slam your foe with a rush of water.
{@b Effect:} Choose up to 5 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d6} cold damage.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d6}), and 17 ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Chilling Crack

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Hammer

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Stream Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Water Rush|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Chilling Crack|GW2EoD}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Crack the ground to chill your foes.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 5 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage and is {@variantrule Chilled|GW2} for 1 round.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d8}), 11 ({@damage 3d8}), and 17 ({@damage 4d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Rain of Blows
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your foes repeatedly. Enemies hit by all strikes become chilled.

optionalfeature.name: Icy Coil
entries: {@b Properties:} Projectile, Circular, Reduced Damage from Conditions

{@b Description:} Summon a projectile of ice that circles around you, damaging foes. While this projectile is active, you take reduced damage from conditions. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Grand Finale
entries: {@b Description:} Redirect any active circular projectiles towards your target.

optionalfeature.name: Crashing Font
entries: {@b Description:} Leap at your target and strike nearby foes. Heal for each target struck. Heal for a lesser amount for each target struck beyond the first.

optionalfeature.name: Cleansing Typhoon
entries: {@b Description:} Strike nearby foes, cleansing a condition for each target struck.

optionalfeature.name: Wind Slam
entries: {@b Description:} Slam your foe with a gust of wind.

optionalfeature.name: Hurricane of Pain
entries: {@b Description:} Manifest a powerful cyclone at the target location, periodically damaging enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Crescent Wind
entries: {@b Description:} Summon a projectile of air that circles around you, damaging foes. While this projectile is active, your chance to critically strike is increased. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Grand Finale
entries: {@b Description:} Redirect any active circular projectiles towards your target.

optionalfeature.name: Wind Storm
entries: {@b Description:} Release a burst of air to knock down your enemies and gain superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Shock Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a blast of lightning that explodes when it reaches its destination, stunning nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Stonestrike
entries: {@b Description:} Arc your hammer, creating a ring of jagged rock to damage your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Whirling Stones
entries: {@b Description:} Encase your hammer with earthen spikes to deliver a powerful blow.

optionalfeature.name: Rocky Loop
entries: {@b Properties:} Projectile, Circular, Reduced Damage from Strikes

{@b Description:} Summon a projectile of earth that circles around you, damaging foes. While this projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Grand Finale
entries: {@b Description:} Redirect any active circular projectiles towards your target.

optionalfeature.name: Immutable Stone
entries: {@b Properties:} Block, Grants Barrier, Grants Aura, Earth
{@b Description:} Block the next attack. If you blocked an attack, gain barrier and an aura based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Ground Pound
entries: {@b Description:} Smash your hammer into the ground to bleed and immobilize your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Fire and Water
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Fire, Water, Circular, Increased Damage, Reduced Condition Damage

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of fire and ice that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the fire projectile is active, it grants you increased outgoing damage. While the ice projectile is active, you take reduced damage from conditions. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Fire and Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Fire, Air, Circular, Increased Damage, Critical Strike Chance

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of fire and that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the fire projectile is active, it grants you increased outgoing damage. While the air projectile is active, your chance to critically strike is increased. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Fire and Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Fire, Earth, Circular, Increased Damage, Reduced Strike Damage

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of fire and earth that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the fire projectile is active, it grants you increased outgoing damage. While the earth projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Water and Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Water, Air, Circular, Reduced Condition Damage, Critical Strike Chance

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of ice and air that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the ice projectile is active, you take reduced damage from conditions. While the air projectile is active, your chance to critically strike is increased. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Water and Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Water, Earth, Circular, Reduced Condition Damage, Reduced Strike Damage

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of fire and ice that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the ice projectile is active, you take reduced damage from conditions. While the earth projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Dual Orbits: Air and Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Air, Earth, Circular, Critical Strike Chance, Reduced Strike Damage

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Summon projectiles of air and earth that circle around you, striking enemies they pass through. While the air projectile is active, your chance to critically strike is increased. While the earth projectile is active, you take reduced damage from strikes. Summoning a circular projectile refreshes the duration of all other circular projectiles.

optionalfeature.name: Deploy Jade Sphere (Fire)
entries: {@b Description:} Summon your Jade Sphere, creating a combo field and granting boons to allies in its radius based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Deploy Jade Sphere (Water)
entries: {@b Description:} Summon your Jade Sphere, creating a combo field and granting boons to allies in its radius based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Deploy Jade Sphere (Air)
entries: {@b Description:} Summon your Jade Sphere, creating a combo field and granting boons to allies in its radius based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Deploy Jade Sphere (Earth)
entries: {@b Description:} Summon your Jade Sphere, creating a combo field and granting boons to allies in its radius based on your current attunement.

optionalfeature.name: Soothing Water
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Regenerate, Cures Conditions, Recharge Reduction
{@b Description:} Augment. Regenerate health and cleanse conditions over time. If this is cast in range of your Water Sphere, the recharge time is reduced.

optionalfeature.name: Relentless Fire
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Damage, Unblockable, Increased Duration
{@b Description:} Augment. Your attacks and conditions deal increased damage, and your attacks are unblockable. If this is cast within range of your Fire Sphere, the duration is increased.

optionalfeature.name: Shattering Ice
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Inflicts Chill, Increased Duration

{@b Description:} Augment. Your successful attacks will trigger an additional strike on nearby enemies that applies chill. If this is cast within range of your Water Sphere, the duration is increased. This effect can occur once per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorating Air
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Grants Regeneration, Grants Superspeed, Recharge Reduction
{@b Description:} Augment. Gain increased endurance regeneration and superspeed. If this is cast within range of your Air Sphere, the recharge time is reduced.

optionalfeature.name: Fortified Earth
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Block, Grants Barrier, Recharge Reduction
{@b Description:} Augment. Block attacks. Gain barrier if the channel completes successfully. If this is cast within range of your Earth Sphere, the recharge time is reduced.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Celerity
entries: {@b Properties:} Augment, Recharge Reduction, Grants Boon
{@b Description:} Augment. Reduce the recharge of weapon skills of your current attunement. If this is activated in range of your sphere, gain a boon based on its element.

optionalfeature.name: Depth of Elements

prerequisite.other: Access to the Catalyst Elite Specialization.

entries: Build up elemental energy when you strike foes. Energy is to imbue the Jade Sphere with different elements, creating combo fields and granting boons to allies in the area. Gain access to Augments.

optionalfeature.name: Hardened Auras
entries: Damage reduction is increased when you grant yourself an aura. When this triggers, the duration of all stacks are refreshed.

optionalfeature.name: Vicious Empowerment
entries: Gain Elemental Empowerment and might when you disable or immobilize a foe.

optionalfeature.name: Energized Elements
entries: Gain energy and boons when you switch attunements. Energy can only be gained while in combat.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Empowerment

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Hardened Auras|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Vicious Empowerment|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Energized Elements|GW2EoD}

entries: Gain Elemental Empowerment while in combat.

optionalfeature.name: Empowering Auras
entries: Gain increased outgoing damage when you grant yourself an aura. When this triggers, the duration of all stacks are refreshed.

optionalfeature.name: Evasive Empowerment
entries: Gain Elemental Empowerment and vigor when evading an attack.

optionalfeature.name: Spectacular Sphere
entries: Your Jade Sphere is larger and grants quickness and an additional boon based on your current attunement to nearby allies when activated.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Epitome

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Empowering Auras|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Evasive Empowerment|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Spectacular Sphere|GW2EoD}

entries: Gain an aura based on your current attunement when you combo. Gain Elemental Empowerment when you grant yourself an aura. Auras can be gained this way once per attunement per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Staunch Auras
entries: Gain stability when you grant yourself an aura.

optionalfeature.name: Empowered Empowerment
entries: Elemental Empowerment is more effective. While at maximum stacks of Elemental Empowerment, its effectiveness is increased further.

optionalfeature.name: Sphere Specialist
entries: Boons applied by your Jade Sphere have increased duration. You can now gain energy while jade spheres are active.

optionalfeature.name: Mace Strike
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Mace Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Smash|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Blast|GW2EoD}

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 3 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d10} bludgeoning damage, and is inflicted with 1 stack of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d10} and {@damage 1d6} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d10} & {@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d10} & {@damage 3d6}), and 17 ({@damage 4d10} & {@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Mace Smash
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Mace Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Smash|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Blast|GW2EoD}
{@b Description:} Smash your target with a heavy blow from your mace, inflicting confusion.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 3 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d12} bludgeoning damage, and is inflicted with 2 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 1d12} and {@damage 1d6} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d12} & {@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d12} & {@damage 3d6}), and 17 ({@damage 4d12} & {@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Mace Blast
entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Mace Strike|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Smash|GW2EoD} -> {@optfeature Mace Blast|GW2EoD}, Explosion
{@b Description:} Smash your target with a final heavy strike, inflicting additional confusion.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 3 creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. Make a weapon melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage, and is inflicted with 3 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.

{@b Scaling:} The damage each increases by {@damage 2d6} and {@damage 1d6} respectively when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 4d6} & {@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 6d6} & {@damage 3d6}), and 17 ({@damage 8d6} & {@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Energizing Slam
entries: {@b Description:} Leap forward and smash the ground, inflicting conditions on foes while granting barrier and boons to allies.

{@b Effect:} Choose a point within range and leap to it. Each hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage 3d6} force damage, is inflicted with 3 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 1 round, and 3 stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage only. Each creature of your choice in the area gains barrier equal to {@dice 1d6} + your class ability modifier, and is granted 1 round of {@variantrule Vigor|GW2} and {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}, healing for {@dice 1d6}.

{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d6}, the number of stacks of {@variantrule Confusion|GW2} increases by 1, the barrier increases by {@dice 1d6}, and the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 4d6}, 4 stacks, {@dice 2d6}, {@dice 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 5d6}, 5 stacks, {@dice 3d6}, {@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 6d6}, 6 stacks, {@dice 4d6}, {@dice 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Rocket Fist Prototype
entries: {@b Description:} Launch a fist that explodes on the first target hit, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Rectifier Signet
entries: {@b Description:} Heal yourself and your mech every second.
{@b Signet Passive:} At the start of each of your turns, you and your {@creature Jade Mech CJ-1|GW2EoD} regain one hit point, if you have at least 1 hit point.
{@b Passive Scaling:} The healing increases by 1 when you reach levels 5 (2), 11 (3), and 17th level (4).
{@b Signet Active:} You and your {@creature Jade Mech CJ-1|GW2EoD} regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your class ability modifier.
{@b Active Scaling:} The healing increases by {@dice 2d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@dice 4d8}), 11 ({@dice 6d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 8d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Barrier Signet
entries: {@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Incoming strike and condition damage is reduced.

{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Create a projectile-blocking dome around yourself. You and allies inside the dome gain barrier every second. If your mech is active, the dome is centered on it and is larger. The mech does not count against the target count for this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Force Signet
entries: {@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Increases strike damage dealt.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Knock foes away from yourself and away from your mech.

optionalfeature.name: Shift Signet
entries: {@b Properties:} Signet, Grants Boons, Removes Conditions, Shadowstep
{@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Increases movement speed. Boons you gain are copied to your mech.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} You and your mech Shadowstep to the target location. Removes conditions on you and your mech.

optionalfeature.name: Superconducting Signet
entries: {@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Increases condition damage dealt.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Creates a damaging field around you that applies conditions to nearby foes. If your mech is active, the field instead radiates from and follows the mech.

optionalfeature.name: Overclock Signet
entries: {@b Description:} {@b Signet Passive:} Reduces recharge of other signets.
{@b Effect:} {@b Signet Active:} Order your mech to fire its ultimate weapon, the jade buster cannon. If your mech is not present, instead your mech is summoned, even if Crash Down is on cooldown.

optionalfeature.name: Recall Mech
entries: {@b Target:} 1 Jade Mech CJ-1 you own
{@b Description:} Recall your mech for repairs. The cooldown of {@optfeature Crash Down|GW2EoD} is determined by the amount of damage your mech has taken.

{@b Effect:} Your Jade Mech CJ-1 is sequestered into a harmless demiplane until you use {@optfeature Crash Down|GW2EoD}, which is now recharging. While sequestered, it regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your class ability modifier at the start of each of your turns. The mech cannot act or be targeted while sequestered. The recharge time of {@optfeature Crash Down|GW2EoD} is reduced by 1 (minimum 5+) per 5% of hit points your mech has when recalled.
{@b Scaling:} The healing increases by {@dice 2d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@dice 4d8}), 11 ({@dice 6d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 8d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Crash Down
entries: {@b Description:} Summon your jade mech at the target area. Foes in the area are damaged. The recharge time of this skill is based on how damaged your mech is.

{@b Effect:} Choose a point within range. Your Jade Mech CJ-1 appears at that point in a burst of energy. Each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d6} force damage and is {@variantrule Launched|GW2} 20 feet. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Mechanical Genius

prerequisite.other: Access to the Mechanist Elite Specialization.

entries: You can now use the {@optfeature Recall Mech|GW2EoD} and {@optfeature Crash Down|GW2EoD} {@variantrule Profession Skill|GW2|Profession Skills}.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Arms: Single-Edge Cutters
entries: You gain access to the Mech Command skill {@optfeature Rolling Smash|GW2EoD}.
Once per target per turn, if your Mech inficts damage to a target, it also inflicts 1 stack of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 1 round, dealing {@damage 1d8} damage.
Additionally, your Mech gains access to the following actions, which he performs when commanded to take the {@b Hard Strike} action:

Bonus Action, if {@b Hard Strike} hit: {@b Heavy Smash.} Melee Attack: Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 plus your Intelligence modifier bludgeoning damage.

Special, if {@b Heavy Smash} hit: {@b Twin Strike.} Two Melee Attacks: Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus your Intelligence modifier bludgeoning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Rolling Smash
entries: {@b Description:} Command your Mech to slam at the target with both cutters, inflicting severe bleeding to enemies in the area.

{@b Effect:} Choose a point within range of your mech. The mech moves to that point and slams the ground with both cutters. Each hostile creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} slashing damage and is inflicted with 4 stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d8} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only.

{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d8} and the number of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} stacks increases by 1 at levels 5 ({@damage 3d8} and 5 stacks), 11 ({@damage 4d8} and 6 stacks), and 17 ({@damage 5d8} and 7 stacks).

optionalfeature.name: Mech Arms: High-Impact Drivers
entries: You gain access to the Mech Command skill {@optfeature Explosive Knuckle|GW2EoD}.
Once per turn, if your Mech inficts damage to a target, it also grants up to 5 creatures of your choice within 60 feet of it 1 stack of {@variantrule Might|GW2} for 2 rounds.
Additionally, your Mech gains access to the following actions, which he performs when commanded to take the {@b Hard Strike} action:

Bonus Action, if {@b Hard Strike} hit: {@b Heavy Smash.} Melee Attack: Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 plus your Intelligence modifier bludgeoning damage.

Special, if {@b Heavy Smash} hit: {@b Twin Strike.} Two Melee Attacks: Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus your Intelligence modifier bludgeoning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Knuckle
entries: {@b Description:} Order your mech to dash at a target, punching with an explosive strike that weakens enemies near the point of impact.

{@b Effect:} Choose a point within range of your mech. The mech moves to that point and delivers an explosive punch. Each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} force damage and is inflicted with 1 round of {@variantrule Weakness|GW2} for 1 round. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d6} at levels 5 ({@damage 4d6}), 11 ({@damage 5d6}), and 17 ({@damage 6d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Mech Arms: Jade Cannons
entries: You gain access to the Mech Command skill {@optfeature Spark Revolver|GW2EoD}.
Once per target per turn, if your Mech inficts damage to a target, it also inflicts 1 stack of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 1 round.
Your Mech's {@variantrule Critical Range|GW2} is increased by 4
Additionally, the {@b Hard Strike} action is replaced with the following action:
Action: {@b Jade Energy Shot.} Two Ranged Attacks: Bonus equal your Intelligence modifier plus your Proficiency Bonus, range 90/320 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus your Intelligence modifier force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Spark Revolver
entries: {@b Description:} Order your mech to fire a rapid volley of jade energy bolts from both arms, piercing through all enemies.

{@b Effect:} Each hostile creature in a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line originating from your mech must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} force damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only.
{@b Scaling:} The damage increases by {@damage 1d8} at levels 5 ({@damage 4d8}), 11 ({@damage 5d8}), and 17 ({@damage 6d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Mech Fighter

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Mech Arms: Single-Edge Cutters|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Mech Arms: High-Impact Drivers|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Mech Arms: Jade Cannons|GW2EoD}

entries: New combat subroutines enable your mech to use Rocket Punch when you activate Skill 3 on your equipped weapon. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your own toughness and vitality stats.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Frame: Conductive Alloys
entries: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Discharge Array. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your own condition damage and expertise stats.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Frame: Channeling Conduits
entries: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Crisis Zone. When you or your mech apply barrier, also grant a boon to the affected target. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your concentration and healing power stats.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Frame: Variable Mass Distributor
entries: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Core Reactor Shot. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your own precision stats.

optionalfeature.name: Exigency Protocols

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Mech Frame: Conductive Alloys|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Mech Frame: Channeling Conduits|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Mech Frame: Variable Mass Distributor|GW2EoD}

entries: When your mech is struck while under half health, it activates Exigency Protocols, gaining damage reduction and regeneration for a short duration. Regeneration boons you apply are stronger.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Core: Jade Dynamo
entries: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Jade Mortar. Mech Command skills grant you quickness when used and have a reduced cooldown.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Core: Barrier Engine
entries: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Barrier Burst. While in combat, your mech will automatically grant a small barrier each interval to nearby allies. The mech does not count against the target count for this trait.

optionalfeature.name: Mech Core: J-Drive
entries: Gain access to the Mech Command skill Sky Circus. While dismissed or away for repairs, your mech supports you with an occasional aerial bombardment. Signet skills gain improved passive effects and continue to grant their passive bonuses while recharging.

optionalfeature.name: Gunstinger
entries: {@b Description:} Quickly step forward to strike your foe while reloading your gun. Restores ammo to skill 5.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon's Roar
entries: {@b Description:} Fire all the barrels in your hand cannon to deal damage to foes in front of you. This skill consumes all your ammo when fired and pushes you back slightly based on the amount of ammo expended.

optionalfeature.name: Unsheathe Gunsaber
entries: {@b Description:} Unsheathe your gunsaber to gain new skills. Changes to your weapon recharge affect this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Sheathe Gunsaber
entries: {@b Description:} Put your gunsaber away and return to your normal weapon set. Changes to your weapon recharge affect this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon Trigger
entries: {@b Description:} Prepare to use Dragon Slash. While channeling, you drain flow. Each interval increases the charge level of Dragon Slash. This skill is cancelled if you move.

optionalfeature.name: Swift Cut
entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Slash your foe, then fire off a ranged shot. Foes hit by the initial attack take less damage from the follow-up shot.

optionalfeature.name: Steel Divide

prerequisite.other: Requires Gunsaber. Must follow Swift Cut.

entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Swing your gunsaber and fire a second shot. Foes hit by the initial attack take less damage from the follow-up shot.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Thrust

prerequisite.other: Requires Gunsaber. Must follow Steel Divide.

entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Hit your foe with a final, brutal stab, and fire a shot that causes a secondary explosion. Foes hit by the initial attack take less damage from the follow-up shot.

optionalfeature.name: Blooming Fire
entries: {@b Description:} Slash with your blade and fire a grenade shell that shatters on impact, releasing a series of explosions.

optionalfeature.name: Artillery Slash
entries: {@b Description:} Consume all charges to launch a single shell from your sword that explodes on the first enemy hit. Deals bonus damage and applies different effects based on the amount of charges consumed.

optionalfeature.name: Cyclone Trigger
entries: {@b Description:} Spin and block enemy projectiles. Strikes all foes in melee range, and then fires shots at foes out of melee range.

optionalfeature.name: Break Step
entries: {@b Description:} Lunge forward with explosive force, damaging enemies at your starting position.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon Slash—Force
entries: {@b Description:} Burst. Slash foes in front of you, ending Dragon Trigger. This attack consumes all charges to deal more damage.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon Slash—Boost
entries: {@b Description:} Burst. Dash forward while slashing all foes in a line, ending Dragon Trigger. This attack consumes all charges to deal more damage.

optionalfeature.name: Dragon Slash—Reach
entries: {@b Description:} Burst. Slash to create a blade of air that strikes foes in a line in front of you, ending Dragon Trigger. This attack consumes all charges to deal more damage.

optionalfeature.name: Triggerguard
entries: {@b Description:} Gain aegis. Using this skill will not end Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Flicker Step
entries: {@b Description:} Blink to a location. Using this skill will not end Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Combat Stimulant
entries: {@b Properties:} Armament, Heal, Grants Boons, Stlm State
{@b Description:} Armament. Heal yourself and enter Stlm State. When Stlm State expires, you are healed again. Using this skill while in Stlm State grants boons.

optionalfeature.name: Flow Stabilizer
entries: {@b Properties:} Armament, Flow Rate, Grants Fury, Grants Flow
{@b Description:} Armament. Increase flow rate and gain fury. If you already have fury, gain additional flow.

optionalfeature.name: Overcharged Cartridges
entries: {@b Description:} Armament. Your next few explosion attacks deal more damage. Using this skill while you already have stacks of Overcharged Cartridges causes you to supercharge your remaining cartridges.

optionalfeature.name: Electric Fence
entries: {@b Properties:} Armament, Block Projectiles, Inflicts Cripple, Immobilize
{@b Description:} Armament. Throw a device that leaves behind a wall of energy, blocking projectiles and crippling foes that pass through it. Foes that are already crippled become immobilized.

optionalfeature.name: Dragonspike Mine
entries: {@b Properties:} Armament, Evade, Explosion, Inflicts Cripple, Recharge Dragon Trigger
{@b Description:} Armament. Evade backward while triggering an explosion that cripples foes. This skill recharges Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Tactical Reload
entries: {@b Properties:} Armament, Reload, Dragon Trigger Charge
{@b Description:} Armament. Reload ammo on all of your bladesworn skills. Your next Dragon Trigger generates more charges per interval.

optionalfeature.name: Gun X Sword

prerequisite.other: Access to the Bladesworn Elite Specialization.

entries: Gain access to the Gunsaber as an alternate weapon set, but lose the ability to swap to other weapon sets during combat. Adrenaline is replaced with flow. Will not activate out of combat unless an enemy is within range.

optionalfeature.name: River's Flow
entries: Incoming healing increased. Healing yourself increases flow rate. Regeneration effects do not trigger flow rate increase.

optionalfeature.name: Swift as the Wind
entries: Movement skills grant swiftness and increase flow rate.

optionalfeature.name: Unseen Sword
entries: Swapping weapons strikes all nearby foes.

optionalfeature.name: Dragonscale Defense

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature River's Flow|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Swift as the Wind|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Unseen Sword|GW2EoD}

entries: Gain boons when entering Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Unshakable Mountain
entries: Gain barrier when you convert flow into charges while below the charge threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Fierce as Fire
entries: Gain increased strike damage for each round of ammunition spent. Using the first round of ammo on an ammunition skill reduces the recharge of all warrior skills. Does not affect the recharge of Unsheathe Gunsaber, Sheathe Gunsaber, and Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Lush Forest
entries: Using the first round of ammo on an ammunition skill reduces the recharge of all warrior skills. Does not affect the recharge of Unsheathe Gunsaber, Sheathe Gunsaber, and Dragon Trigger.

optionalfeature.name: Guns and Glory

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Unshakable Mountain|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Fierce as Fire|GW2EoD} or {@optfeature Lush Forest|GW2EoD}

entries: Gain ferocity for a short duration when you hit with an explosion. The effect stacks duration.

optionalfeature.name: Immortal Dragon
entries: Dragon Slash heals you for a percentage of the damage dealt. Gain protection whenever you convert flow into charges.

optionalfeature.name: Unyielding Dragon
entries: Dragon Slash becomes unblockable and ignores blindness. Gain might whenever you convert flow into charges.

optionalfeature.name: Daring Dragon
entries: Dragon Slash has a lower maximum charge level and consumes more flow per charge, but its damage per charge is increased. Grant boons to nearby allies when you use Dragon Slash.

spell.name: Bladesong Harmony
entries: You unleash your stocked Blades in a flurry, piercing through creatures to your target.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make N ranged spell attacks against the target, where N is the amount of Blades expended. The target cannot benefit from cover provided by other creatures. On a hit, the target takes psychic or piercing damage (your choice) equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die.
Any creature between you and the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take half the damage total rolled on all attacks that hit. On a success they take no damage.
Instead of rolling with advantage or disadvantage, you instead gain a +5 bonus to hit when you would have advantage or a -5 penalty to hit when you would have disadvantage.
Bladesong. Fire all stocked blades at your target.

spell.name: Bladesong Sorrow
entries: Your Blades cut through reality to spike themselves into a creature’s mind.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make N ranged spell attacks against the target, where N is half the amount of Blades expended. The target cannot benefit from cover provided by other creatures. On a hit, the target takes psychic or piercing damage (your choice) equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die and is {@variantrule Confusion|GW2|confused} for 1 round taking damage equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die.

Any creature between you and the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take half the damage total rolled on all attacks that hit and also be {@variantrule Confusion|GW2|confused}. On a success they take no damage and are not {@variantrule Confusion|GW2|confused}.
Instead of rolling with advantage or disadvantage, you instead gain a +5 bonus to hit when you would have advantage or a -5 penalty to hit when you would have disadvantage.
Bladesong. Fire all stocked blades, inflicting your target with conditions.

spell.name: Bladesong Dissonance
entries: Combine your Blades into one and drive it into the mind of a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take piercing or psychic damage (your choice) equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die and be {@condition incapacitated} for a number of rounds equal to a third of the amount of Blades expended.
At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make an Intelligence saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Bladesong. Combine all your blades into one large blade that dazes targets based on the number of blades consumed.

spell.name: Bladesong Distortion
entries: Use your Blades to distort reality around yourself.
For a number of turns equal to half of the amount of Blades expended you gain {@variantrule Distortion|GW2}.
Bladesong. Gain distortion and consume all stocked blades, gaining additional distortion for each consumed blade.

spell.name: Bladeturn Requiem
entries: Create a ring of deadly Blades around yourself.
Psychic Blades spin around you in a 10-foot Emanation for a number of rounds equal to half of the amount of Blades expended.

When you cast this Bladesong, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature's Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes psychic or piercing damage (your choice) equal to N rolls of your Bardic Inspiration die, where N is half of the amount of Blades expended. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
Bladesong. Send your blades spinning around you to hit nearby foes. Spinning blade duration scales with number of blades consumed.

subclassFeature.name: Mechanist
entries: You have adopted the Mechanist Elite Specialization. You gain proficiency with {@item Mace|XPHB|Maces} and can use their {@variantrule Weapon Skill|GW2|Weapon Skills}.

You now qualify to learn Mechanist specific {@variantrule Healing Skill|GW2|Healing Skills}, {@variantrule Utility Skill|GW2|Utility Skills}, and {@variantrule Elite Skill|GW2|Elite Skills} when you choose your skills.

Through your mechanical genius, you have utilized Canthan jade technology to build a customized battle mech that will fight at your side. The mech uses the {@creature Jade Mech CJ-1|GW2EoD} stat block. You determine how the mech looks, but it is typically humanoid in shape and stands about 7 feet tall.
The mech is Friendly to you and your allies and obeys your commands. It deanimates if you die.

{@b The Mech in Combat.} In Combat, the mech acts during your turn. It can move and use its {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} on its own, but the only action it takes is the {@action Dodge|XPHB} action unless you take a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to command it to take an action in its stat block or some other action. You can also sacrifice one of your attacks when you take the Attack action to command the mech to take the Hard Strike action. If you have the {@condition Incapacitated} condition, the mech acts on its own and isn't limited to the {@action Dodge|XPHB} action.

{@b Restoring or Replacing the Mech.} If the mech has died within the last hour, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to touch it and expend a {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}. The mech returns to life after 1 minute with all its Hit Points restored.
When you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, you can construct a new mech if your previous one has been destroyed.

subclassFeature.name: Elite Specialization
entries: You gain access to the {@table Engineer Traits|GW2|Mechanist} Specialization and learn its Minor Adept {@variantrule traits|GW2|trait} {@optfeature Mechanical Genius|GW2EoD}.

subclassFeature.name: Advanced Robotics
entries: Through tinkering and upgrades, you have improved your mech's capabilities. Your can now add your {@table Proficiency Bonus|XPHB} to the mech's {@variantrule Armor Class|XPHB}.

subclassFeature.name: Neural Link
entries: You developed a neural interface to better control your mech. You can now communicate telepathically with your mech within a range of 1 mile. Additionally, you can use your action to see and hear through your mech's sensors until the start of your next turn. While doing so, you are {@condition Blinded} and {@condition Deafened} with regard to your own senses.

subclassFeature.name: High-Level Robotics
entries: You developed jade-powered jets to enhance your mech's mobility. Your mech's speed increases by 30 feet, and it gains a flying speed (hover) equal to its walking speed.

subclassFeature.name: Infra Red Optics
entries: Developoment of advanced optics allows your mech to see in the darkest conditions. Your mech gains darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Masterful Robotics
entries: You have developed a link between yourself and your mech, allowing it to benefit from your own prowess. Add your ability modifier to the mech's ability modifiers (minimum of +1).

subclassFeature.name: Improved Sensors
entries: You drastically improve your mech's sensory systems. Your mech gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or hearing. Additionally, your mech gains truesight out to a range of 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Robotics
entries: You have achieved the pinnacle of mech engineering. Your mech gains sentience and can act independently of you. It gains the following benefits:
{@b Improved Cognition.} The mech can now speak, read, write, and understand all languages.
{@b Independent Actions.} In combat, the mech can now act independently of you, taking its own turn in the initiative order. It can move and take actions as normal without requiring your command.
{@b Magically Enhanced Systems.} The mech can now attune to up to two magic items.
{@b Mechanical Resilience.} The mech has advantage on all saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Blades
entries: You learned to weave your bardic magics into metaphysical manifestations of your talent.

{@bold Stocking Baldes.} Whenever you expend a use of your Bardic Inspiration or expend a spell slot to cast a Bard spell you stock psychic Blades. When you stock Blades by expending a use of your Bardic Inspiration, you stock an amount equal to your Proficiency Bonus. When you stock Blades via a spell you stock an amount equal to the slot level expended. You can have a maximum number of Blades stocked at one time as shown in the Max. Blades column of the Virtuoso table. The Blades last until used or you die.

{@bold Expending Blades.} Some features require you to make attack rolls with your Blades or force creatures to make saving throws against your Blades. In either case, use your Bard Spellcasting feature to determine the attack bonus and saving throw DC.

subclassFeature.name: Bladesongs
entries: You know five special spells called Bladesongs, which use your Blades in various ways.

{@bold Bladesong Rules} You always have them prepared, and they don’t count against the number of Bard spells you can prepare. Each Bladesong indicates how many Blades you must have at a minimum to use them. All Bladesongs expend all stocked Blades in their casting.

subclassFeature.name: Adept Virtuoso
entries: You just learned to be a virtuoso; choose one of the following three disciplines, and you gain the benefit of that choice until you finish a long rest, at which point you can choose again.
{@bold Bladeturn Refrain.} You learned to keep an echo of your Blades around as a defensive measure when casting a Bladesong. When you cast a Bladesong, you gain 1 round of {@variantrule Aegis|GW2}.

{@bold Mental Focus.} You learned to focus your mind on the weaknesses of close creatures. When you deal damage to a creature within 30 feet of yourself you can add half your Charisma modifier to that damage.

{@bold Jagged Mind.} You learned to sharpen your Blades to perfection with the power of your mind. When you deal piercing damage to a creature, that creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or start {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus, taking damage equal to half your Charisma modifier. If you critically hit the creature, they automatically fail their saving throw. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends. Additionally, once per turn when you inflict damage via a {@variantrule condition|GW2} you inflicted, you regain hit points equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Blades
entries: Your Blades have become much more deadly, piercing most defenses.

When you deal piercing damage to a creature, that creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus. If you critically hit the creature, they automatically fail their saving throw. Additionally, after you cast a Bladesong, the next time you deal damage before the end of your next turn with a spell or a weapon, you can add one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die to that damage.

subclassFeature.name: Master Virtuoso
entries: You have become a master virtuoso. Choose one of the following disciplines. You gain the benefits of your choice until you finish a long rest, at which point you can choose again.

{@bold Duelist’s Reversal.} You have learned to quickly retaliate against creatures that miss you. When an attack roll misses you, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to gain the following Boons for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus: {@variantrule Quickness|GW2}, {@variantrule Fury|GW2}, and {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}, healing for 1d6.

{@bold Phantasmal Blades.} You weave your arcane magics into swift blades. When you deal damage to one or more creatures with a spell, or one or more creatures fail a saving throw against a non-damaging spell of yours, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to fire a psychic blade at each affected creature. Make a ranged spell attack against each target. On a hit, the target takes psychic or piercing damage (your choice) equal to one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die. Additionally, you gain {@variantrule Fury|GW2} for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus.

{@bold Sharpening Sorrow.} You turn a creature’s sorrow into a momentary boost of precision. When you cast Bladesong Sorrow, you can expend one use of your Bardic Inspiration to gain Fury for a number of rounds equal to your proficiency bonus.
Additionally, while you have {@variantrule Fury|GW2}, the duration of any {@variantrule condition|GW2|conditions} you inflict is doubled.

subclassFeature.name: Quiet Intensity
entries: Through calm grace and fluid movement, you have perfected the art of your Bladesongs. While you have {@variantrule Fury|GW2}, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 3. Additionally, when you score a critical hit, you can add one roll of your Bardic Inspiration die to the damage.

subclassFeature.name: Grandmaster Virtuoso
entries: You are the pinnacle of what a virtuoso can become; choose one of the following three disciplines, and you gain the benefit of that choice until you finish a long rest, at which point you can choose again.

{@bold Psychic Riposte.} You learned to use your opponent’s momentary failure to your advantage. When an attack roll misses you, you can stock an amount of Blades equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Additionally, the next Bladesong you use before the end of your next turn gains the {@background Unblockable|GW} property, and you have advantage on the attack rolls.

{@bold Infinite Forge.} You learned the rhythm of combat; stocking Blades becomes second nature to you while in combat. When you roll initiative and at the start of your turn during combat, you stock an amount of Blades equal to half your Proficiency Bonus. Additionally, when you cast a Bladesong while having the maximum number of Blades stocked, you regain an amount of Blades equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
Furthermore, when you deal piercing or psychic damage, you can deal extra damage equal to half your Proficiency Bonus.

{@bold Bloodsong.} You learned to serrate the edges of your Blades, making them much more deadly. {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} you inflict deals double damage. At the start of your turn you regain a number of Blades equal to a fifth of the damage inflicted via your {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} since the end of your last turn.
